Type.Name: FillRule

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed FillRule extends System.Enum

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: The method for determining which pixels are included in a region, when creating a from a polygon.
Docs.remarks: The fill rule is only relevant for polygons which overlap themselves.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.FillRule EvenOddRule = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Areas which are overlapped an odd number of times are included in the region, while areas overlapped an even number of times are not.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.FillRule WindingRule = int32(1)
